tool_description: Check if a username is available on multiple social networks like Twitter, Reddit, YouTube, Tumblr, and more. If you would like a new platform, or a new feature, please send us a message or use the discussion board. This project is in active development and new platforms will be added in the near future.
title: Username Availability
